Title: Surath Kumar Srivastva | Personal Webpage
Name: Surath Kumar Srivastva
Description: A 4th year under-graduate student from National Institute of Technology, Silchar. Passionate about Software Development, Web technologies and Open Source.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a coding geek major by day, a cricket player by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and joyful always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, or studying in library.
I am passionate about Web Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Shah Rukh Khan.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to be happy and work together .
